sentence.text: With a combination of whole-genome mapping and exome sequencing, we identified three mutations in endoplasmic reticulum tubular network organization in two families with HSP: a missense variant (c.107TAAAAA [p.Val36Glu]) that segregated in the heterozygous state in a family with autosomal-dominant inheritance and a missense change (c.215TAAAAA [p.Phe72Tyr]) that segregated in trans with a splice site mutation (c.105+3GAAAAT) in a family with autosomal-recessive transmission.
